title: test_root_info_endpoint
description: Verify that the root info endpoint '/' returns a 200 OK status and the expected root information.

title: test_health_check_endpoint
description: Verify that the health check endpoint '/health' returns a 200 OK status indicating the service is healthy.

title: test_swagger_ui_documentation_endpoint
description: Verify that the Swagger UI documentation endpoint '/docs' returns a 200 OK status and serves the API documentation correctly.

title: test_auth_login_with_email_password
description: Verify that the '/api/auth/login' endpoint allows users to login with valid email and password, returning tokens and professional data, and returns 401 for invalid credentials.

title: test_auth_refresh_access_token
description: Verify that the '/api/auth/refresh' endpoint refreshes the access token when provided a valid refresh token, and returns 401 for invalid or expired tokens.

title: test_auth_logout
description: Verify that the '/api/auth/logout' endpoint successfully logs out the user and invalidates tokens.

title: test_auth_request_otp
description: Verify that the '/api/auth/request-otp' endpoint sends an OTP to the user and returns a 200 OK status.

title: test_auth_verify_otp
description: Verify that the '/api/auth/verify-otp' endpoint validates the OTP correctly, returns tokens and professional data on success, and returns 401 for invalid OTP.

title: test_auth_test_otp_retrieval
description: Verify that the test-only endpoint '/api/auth/test/otp/{identifier}' returns the OTP value for the given identifier and returns 404 if not found.

title: test_professionals_list_pagination
description: Verify that the '/api/professionals' GET endpoint returns a paginated list of professionals with correct tenant isolation and role-based access control.
